file_content.text: It's good to see you again, Lieutenant. It is lieutenant now, right? You're doing so well for yourself--I'm very proud.
I have to thank you for working this little meeting into your very busy schedule. It took me some trouble to arrange.
In the name of the Republic, I order you to surrender!
Give yourself up!
You know, you're so threatening over holo that I might even consider it. Let me get back to you later.
Are you hiding? Show yourself!
Where are you?
I'm afraid I'm some distance away at the moment--and coming in person would waste your precious time.
Great. I told Garza this was a trap.
You set me up.
It must bother you, the way she casually gambles with your life.
I guess it's no surprise that you're too cowardly to fight me yourself.
I should've known.
And I suppose everyone who outsmarts you is a coward--is that right? You must meet an awful lot of cowards....
But that isn't what I wanted to discuss with you today.
You have caused me a great deal of difficulty, Lieutenant. Some have even called you my nemesis. Was that your goal?
My goal is to bring traitors to justice.
I'm just doing my duty.
So is mine, Lieutenant.
What's your goal, Tavus? Why are you doing this?
Let's talk about you.
My goal--our goal--is to fight injustice. To destroy the greatest murderers of all.
I just want to kill everyone you care about, one by one.
My goal is revenge.
That much was already clear.
Some of the best soldiers I've ever known. Some of my closest friends, dead by your hands.
They were heroes, Lieutenant!
Your squad-mates betrayed the Republic. Just like you.
They were traitors.
You're a fool.
I enjoyed killing them, Tavus. And I'm going to enjoy killing you.
Didn't make it any less fun.
You make me sick.
If you need a minute to cry, I can call back.
Get over yourself.
In my entire career, only one other enemy has been as difficult as you: the Imperial Shadow Fist.
One of the most elite commando units in all of the Sith Empire. Five of the Emperor's deadliest agents.
Please--end this before anyone else has to die.
Surrender, Tavus.
I have only just begun, Lieutenant.
You've seen the Empire's evil--how can you ignore it now?
I can't believe you.
I fought Imperial troops in battle, but it was the Republic's treachery that I saw firsthand.
Five guys, Shadow Fist--yeah, I get it. Is this random history lesson going somewhere?
Quit blabbering.
Havoc Squad and the Shadow Fist fought many times. We battled to a standstill over and over again.
We were the worst of enemies, but times have changed, Lieutenant. Meet my five newest friends.
Havoc Squad, defensive positions!
Ambush!
Let's do this!
Ready, sir!
Slaughter protocols activated!
Lower your weapons!
I always enjoy meeting new people.
Bring 'em on.
So do we.
You think I can't handle these guys, Tavus?
Nobody scares me.
You can't.
You're overdue for a painful death, Lieutenant. Goodbye.
Needles, Fuse, Wraith... some of the best soldiers I've ever known.
Needles, Gearbox, Wraith... all dead. And for what?
Needles, Wraith... both killed in their prime.
Needles, Fuse, Gearbox... how could you bring yourself to do it?
Needles, Fuse... I can't believe it.
Needles, Gearbox... it's astounding.
Needles... even Captain Andrik! What is wrong with you?
